name: ShuttleTrain
title: 火车班车
author: Simwir
description: 想从你那庞大基地的一端到另一端？讨厌跑路或驾驶汽车？那为什么不乘火车呢。有了这个MOD，你将得到一个快速、有效的方式使用您的铁路基础设施作为你的个人观光交通工具。
description_original: Want to get from one end of your big expansive base to the other? Hate running or driving cars? Then why not take the train. With this mod you get a quick and effective way to use your rail infrastructure for personal transportation.
